remarks: Membership in the subspace sum of two Hilbert subspaces.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Dec-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
shsel $p |- ( ( A e. SH /\ B e. SH ) -> ( C e. ( A +H B ) <-> E. x e. A E. y e. B C = ( x +h y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
